summary.span: Helper 類別，這個類別可設定文字容器中的文字效果。

span.span: A helper class that sets text effects in a text container

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用， ，和文字的文字效果。The following example shows how to apply a , , and text effect to text. 以下是範例 XAML。Below is the XAML for the example. span.span: The effect to apply on the text

summary.span: 將文字範圍中的文字效果解析為文字效果目標清單。

span.span: Resolves text effect on a text range to a list of text effect targets.

returns.span: 物件的集合，這個集合對應至文字範圍。

span.span: Collection of objects corresponding to the text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對每一個連續的文字區塊，此方法會建立為目標的範圍 （父系） 項目文字效果。For each continuous block of text, this method creates a text effect targeting the scoping (parent) element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用， ，和文字的文字效果。The following example shows how to apply a , , and text effect to text. 以下是範例 XAML。Below is the XAML for the example.
